dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: A new day dawns...
Hey, wake up!

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: ...Where am I?

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You open your eyes to find yourself in a dimly lit room.
Finally! I've been trying to wake you for ages.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As your eyes adjust to the dim light, you notice a figure standing by the window.
Don't worry, you're safe here. Though I imagine you have many questions.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Who are you? And how did I get here?

dialogues.speaker: Mysterious Figure
dialogues.text: My name is Sarah. I found you unconscious in the forest last night.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: You were running a high fever, so I brought you to my cabin.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Sarah moves away from the window, her silhouette becoming clearer.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: Do you remember anything about what happened?

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Everything's a blur... I remember running, but I don't know from what.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: That's not uncommon. The forest has that effect on people sometimes.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You decide to keep your eyes closed, drifting back into the dream...

dialogues.speaker: Dream Voice
dialogues.text: Perhaps it's better this way...

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The darkness around you begins to shift and swirl.

dialogues.speaker: Dream Voice
dialogues.text: In dreams, we sometimes find truths that reality conceals.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Shapes begin to form in the darkness, memories perhaps...

dialogues.speaker: Dream Voice
dialogues.text: Do you remember now? Why you were running?

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: There was... something in the forest...

dialogues.speaker: Dream Voice
dialogues.text: Yes... the forest holds many secrets.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The darkness pulses with an otherworldly energy.

dialogues.speaker: Dream Voice
dialogues.text: But are you ready to remember the truth?

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: What did you mean about the forest having that effect on people?

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: This isn't an ordinary forest. Strange things happen here.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: Time moves differently among the trees. Memories become... fluid.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Sarah's expression grows serious as she gazes out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: You're not the first person I've found wandering these woods.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: And I doubt you'll be the last.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Why do you live out here alone?

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: Who says I'm alone?

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: A knowing smile crosses her face.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: The forest is full of life, if you know where to look.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: And sometimes, it brings me visitors who need help.

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: Like you.
